title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: Wtf...creators of the mess still enjoy the life and their lazy kids spending our money.Atleast Let the creators the bankers Will put money to markets yesrterday i followed signal and again it didnt work the rich bankers who Made all this mess now left their offices but no solution atleast Let them make new system wich Will supply us with money.We dont care about btc price low or up we just need futures markets working again so there is no funds in futures.They been told many times that If the USA dont supply trhough repo operations markets LET them use other currency to provide liquity like year 2021 was it they been told that many times.Fix the problem first dont go just on vacation with your yachts.We can inflate any country currency for markets liquity or Even take the new one there is no problem We can use other country currency to provide a lot money to markets we want binance futures leverage back to 30x-50x now Even main coins Like SOLANA only 8x leverage cmon guys SOLANA price went up so much i only had 8x leverage it's not enough profit.People been sent this requests of Market support to Biden it's so serious issue now.Power to traders i stand with traders.Right now it's serious the bankers should Fix their mess If diconnected USA printing press from the markets LET them put other country or Stable coins system they can use USDC to provide good liquity for the futures traders.Cmon we are Also the financial people we should work together to improve markets together with goverments.We cant lose income like this we have expenses to pay i have to eat out and food not cheap Also i need to enjoy time in bar every evening becouse me and friends must have drinks to enjoy bankers cant LET us down.It's time for goverment to get on and start punishing bankers who dont provide liquity to markets.

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I don't have any problem about you venting around here, but for us who live outside of the United States, some context on what you are specifically talking about would be appreciated.What happened this time in your country?Have the government there restricted bankers and hedge-funds from participating on Wall Street during the Christmas season?

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Let me say that all this is not necessary because this is the way things play around the world, nothing could change it. Your thinking might be in form of manipulation, but in the real sense, it's just the weakness of the system we find ourselves in as humans, and this is not peculiar to the US only.And for the inability to eat what you like, no one is to be blamed here but for the economic situation of the world. Inflation is affecting everything, and the US people are not the only ones feeling it. The government might help, and banks might help too, but their interest in your crypto concern matters, it is not by force. Note that the situation has nothing to do with the liquidity of the main banks in any way.The US is not even taking nonsense when it comes to investments and finances, they are sanctioning enough that are erring as far as I know.
